meanings.sent1: The bigwigs in the company made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The city's bigwigs attended the charity gala.
meanings.sent3: The bigwigs at the party were the first to hit the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, bigwigs control the market's direction.
meanings.sent5: The bigwigs' presence at the event was impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: Person in a position of authority or power
meanings.sent1: The bigwigs at the meeting discussed the new project.
meanings.sent2: The bigwigs of the organization set the strategic goals.
meanings.sent3: The bigwigs in the office always had the best snacks.
meanings.sent4: The bigwigs of the industry were known for their lavish lifestyles.
meanings.sent5: The bigwigs' decisions shaped the future of the company.
